name: Fish Passage & Barrier Effects (longitudinal connectivity) screening curve

points.description: Good: No barrier within watershed OR barriers provide beneficial effect on project area and allows for aquatic organism passage. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)
Fair: Barrier exists but does not adversely affect aquatic organism passage OR a small blockage exists that is creating a minor fish passage barrier. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

Poor: Aquatic organism barriers (including impoundment(s)) located within 1 mile upstream or downstream of project area has a negative effect on aquatic organism passage. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.39)
